title: EUNE Lags
body: I recently played 2 games of league , i had a lot of lags in both of them , and it was not only me , everybody did . After the matches ended i noticed that the enemy team didn't receive loss prevented due to the lags , and in the second match the lags were freaking HUGE and i lost the match because nobody was able to play . I demand my LP's back , it is not my fault or my team's fault we lost because the game was unplayable.

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a recorded issue with the servers on the [Service Status page.](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) Are you still experiencing this issue, or has it been resolved?

LP cannot be modified in any way after the server records a gain/loss. The system was designed this way to prevent any abuse of the system. Let me know if you have any further issues or any questions.
